GSD.description:
ALSA: oss: Fix PCM OSS buffer allocation overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.109 by commit 5ce74ff7059341d8b2f4d01c3383491df63d1898. For more details please see the references link.
